alert.note: Alert for Renville; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 11:51AM CST until December 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 9 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Renville and Ward Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near whiteout conditions are possible in rural areas.
info.instruction: Persons should consider delaying all travel. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
